data.title: Salman Khan's 'Bigg Boss 18' to premiere in October: Report
data.meta_description: Salman Khan's 'Bigg Boss 18' is reportedly set to premiere in October 2024. No contestants have been officially announced yet.
data.text:
'Bigg Boss 18' is scheduled to premiere in October 2024. Following the grand finale of 'Bigg Boss OTT 3', fans eagerly await official announcements about the main season's premiere date, contestants, and other details. Reports indicate that the 18th season will launch on Colors TV later this year, with Salman Khan returning as host.

According to NDTV, 'Bigg Boss 18' will premiere on October 4, 2024. While no contestants have been officially confirmed, recent speculation suggests possibilities. Payal Malik, a contestant from 'Bigg Boss OTT 3', claimed in a YouTube video that her husband Armaan Malik's second wife, Kritika Malik, had been approached for the show.

advertisement

Several names have been circulating online as potential contestants for 'Bigg Boss 18'. Actors such as Gurucharan Singh, Arjun Bijlani, Sameera Reddy, Pooja Sharma, Dalljiet Kaur, Shiney Ahuja, and Karan Patel are rumoured to be joining the controversial reality TV show.

Additionally, popular social media influencers like Mr Faisu, Dolly Chaiwala, Maxtern, Abhishek Malhan, and Thugesh are also rumoured to be participating in the show. 'Splitsvilla 15' contestants Digvijay Rathee, Unnati Tomar, Siwet Tomar, Kashish Kapoor, and Akriti Negi are also rumoured to be joining the 'Bigg Boss 18' lineup.

Meanwhile, 'Bigg Boss OTT 3' was won by actor Sana Makbul. Rapper Naezy emerged as the first runner-up and Ranvir Shorey as the second runner-up. The show was hosted by actor Anil Kapoor.

Published By:

Anisha Rao

Published On:

Aug 8, 2024
